name: Pinky Adventures
description:
Pinky Adventures

Description of the game:

A colorful platformer with puzzle elements that will amaze both children and adults. 50 full-fledged levels, in each of them, puzzles are waiting for you. Build your path with boxes and platforms while avoiding obstacles.

Control:

Player Movement - W, A, S, D (or Arrows)

Level restart - Space

Exit to the menu - Esc

Attention!

The game is under development, some features are not yet available. Such as "Training"

Game in Russian language.

Game version: 0.8.0.7
